exclusion.criterion: Disabling Pulmonary Disease and History of Asthma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The SGOT level more than 3 times of the normal threshold
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Positive history of hypersensitivity to saffron, rose water and honey
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive history of gout or high level of uric acid
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: An individual who uses antidepressants due to depression
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Simultaneous use of drugs that affect fatigue
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and has been experiencing severe pain. He has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
